problem.markdown:
Check your understanding after you have gone through the basic theory and the procedure to use the simulator.
1. Mass of water striking the plate per second is ρaV.( say true or false)
(x) True ( ) False
2. Impact of jet means the force exerted by the
(x) Jet on the plate ( ) Plate on the jet ( ) Any of the above ( ) None of the above
3. A jet of water of diameter 75mm,velocity 25m/sec strikes a fixed plate in such a way that the angle between the jet and plate is 60° Find the force exerted by the jet on the plate in direction normal to the plate.
( ) 2350N ( ) 2931N (x) 2391N ( ) 2530N
